text:
Keepsafe | San Francisco | Senior Backend Engineer | VISA| ONSITE

Keepsafe makes privacy tools for consumers. Over 60 million people have used our flagship app.

We are looking to hire a senior backend engineer to build out our secure sync infrastructure and lay the groundwork for new products that are in the pipeline.

Keepsafe cares about what you can do, not about credentials: https://www.getkeepsafe.com/noresume.html

All jobs here: https://www.getkeepsafe.com/careers.html
